name: Alilabas
description:
The game was made for the SpeedJam#1.

Hi,
My name is Harry and I'm the fastest thief in the world, will you take on my reputation ? Aren't you convinced ?

Well, that's good because I've got some stealing to do.

Controls : 

- joystick support.

- keyboard keys can be changed.

- you can carry objects and then to move, throw or put them down.

- you can jump to ... jump.

- you can erase your data with the num lock key.

- num lock key deletes all your data. It helped me in the development, I leave it just in case.

Your goal is to get all items back to the door.

PS : Yes, I throw mirrors without breaking them. That's what being a good thief is all about.
